abstract.t: Explicit multicast(Xcast)[1] is a new kind of Internet multicast,and encodes the list of destinations within its packet. Thisdocument specifies tunneling scheme of Xcast packets. Since asingle Xcast tunnel has multiple egress-nodes, the original Xcastpacket can be encapsulated either within a Xcast packet or within aunicast packet. When tunneled by Xcast-in-Xcast encapsulation, thebitmap of the original Xcast packet is overwritten by the bitmap ofthe tunnel Xcast packet at tunnel egress-nodes, in order to controlthe active destination set.
